resources.string: Not Match Fashion for Pear Body

Adding volume on the top of your head will help elongate your face. To achieve this look take some voluminizing gel and gently apply it to the roots of your hair

A hairdo that sits close to the sides of your face will visually slim down your cheekbones and chin by keep drawing the eye down and up, instead of to the sides

Below the chin haircuts help draw the eye up and down and make your face look more angular.
While you are what are described above, it is not always true that you can wear everything you want. Clothing colors should also coordinate to your skin tone and hair.
DO keep hems of pants, skirts and dresses wide to balance the hips.
V-necks are not good, but bows and soft cowls are fine

Conceal your blemishes. Oily skin is prone to breakouts and blemishes. Applying light layers of liquid matte concealer will help to minimize these imperfections without causing new breakouts. Use the wand or a concealer brush to cover your dark circles, red marks, and imperfections. For additional coverage, apply a layer of liquid concealer, followed by a layer of powder foundation and another layer of liquid concealer. Seal in the makeup with a final coat of powder foundation. The more layers you apply, the more likely you are to see shiny spots throughout the day. This application method may require several touch ups. Avoid cream concealers—they will clog your pores.

Long-lasting powder foundations create an even complexion while combatting excess oil. Before you purchase foundation, read the label carefully—make sure the product is oil-free, mattifying, and noncomedogenic (will not clog your pores). Apply a thin, even layer of powder with a large powder brush. Move the brush in a circular and dabbing motion. If you need additional coverage, apply a second layer of powder with a clean, damp sponge. Move the sponge in a circular and dabbing motion.[9] If you do not like powder foundation, select a mousse foundation or a water-based liquid foundation.
Although being the least problematic type, still requires cleaning, nourishing, and moisturizing.
Although being the least problematic type, still requires cleaning, nourishing, and moisturizing.
